solution_line_template: Reggie makes {reggie_layups_made} points off layups because {reggie_layups_made} x {layup_points_value} = <<{reggie_layups_made}*{layup_points_value}={reggie_layup_points}>>{reggie_layup_points}

Reggie makes {reggie_free_throws_made} points off free-throws because {reggie_free_throws_made} x {free_throw_points_value} = <<{reggie_free_throws_made}*{free_throw_points_value}={reggie_free_throw_points}>>{reggie_free_throw_points}

Reggie makes {reggie_long_shots_made} points off long shots because {reggie_long_shots_made} x {long_shot_points_value} = <<{reggie_long_shots_made}*{long_shot_points_value}={reggie_long_shot_points}>>{reggie_long_shot_points}

His brother scores {brother_total_points} points because {brother_long_shots_made} x {long_shot_points_value} = <<{brother_long_shots_made}*{long_shot_points_value}={brother_total_points}>>{brother_total_points}
